tools.name: discover_services
tools.description: List all available x402 Engine APIs with pricing, endpoints, and payment networks. Call this first to understand what's available.

tools.name: generate_image
tools.description: Generate an image from a text prompt. Three quality tiers: 'fast' ($0.015, FLUX Schnell), 'quality' ($0.05, FLUX.2 Pro), 'text' ($0.12, Ideogram v3 for images with text). Returns image URL.

tools.name: execute_code
tools.description: Execute code in a secure sandboxed environment (E2B). Supports Python, JavaScript, Bash, and R. $0.005 per execution.

tools.name: transcribe_audio
tools.description: Transcribe audio to text using Deepgram Nova-3. Accepts a public URL to an audio file. $0.10 per transcription.

tools.name: get_crypto_price
tools.description: Get current prices for cryptocurrencies. $0.001 per request.

tools.name: get_crypto_markets
tools.description: Get top cryptocurrencies by market cap with detailed market data. $0.002 per request.

tools.name: get_crypto_history
tools.description: Get historical price data for a cryptocurrency. $0.003 per request.

tools.name: get_trending_crypto
tools.description: Get trending cryptocurrencies. $0.001 per request.

tools.name: search_crypto
tools.description: Search for a cryptocurrency by name or symbol. $0.001 per request.

tools.name: get_wallet_balances
tools.description: Get token balances for a wallet address on any supported chain. $0.005 per request.

tools.name: get_wallet_transactions
tools.description: Get transaction history for a wallet address. $0.005 per request.

tools.name: get_wallet_pnl
tools.description: Get profit and loss analysis for a wallet's token trades. $0.01 per request.

tools.name: get_token_prices
tools.description: Get DEX-derived prices for tokens by contract address. $0.005 per request.

tools.name: get_token_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata for a token (name, symbol, decimals, etc.). $0.002 per request.

tools.name: pin_to_ipfs
tools.description: Pin JSON data to IPFS via Pinata. Returns the IPFS CID. $0.01 per pin.

tools.name: get_from_ipfs
tools.description: Retrieve content from IPFS by CID. $0.001 per request.

tools.name: search_flights
tools.description: Search flight offers by route, dates, and passengers. Returns pricing, itineraries, and airlines. $0.01 per request.

tools.name: search_locations
tools.description: Search for airports and cities by keyword. Returns IATA codes, names, and coordinates. $0.005 per request.

tools.name: search_hotels
tools.description: Search hotel offers by city and dates. Returns room details, pricing, and availability. $0.01 per request.

tools.name: search_cheapest_dates
tools.description: Find the cheapest travel dates for a route. Returns date/price pairs sorted by price. $0.01 per request.
